verbose_text: Flow cytometry analysis demonstrated that miR-214 mimics clearly promoted cell apoptosis compared with the mimics NC group, while miR-214 inhibitors markedly decreased apoptosis compared with the inhibitors NC group (XREF_FIG).
evidence: miR-214 mimics clearly promoted cell apoptosis compared with the mimics NC group, while miR-214 inhibitors markedly decreased apoptosis
